# A basic link: to Google

# An example of a link to an image in HTML

```
The demographic response we have now for COVID-19 supports Fauci's statement. See the image: <img border="0" src="https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/69/wr/figures/mm6915e3-F1.gif" width="1060" height="607">
```
